description.p: KRecipes is a highly configurable recipe manager, designed to make organizing your personal recipes collection fast and easy. Features include: shopping lists, nutrient analysis, advanced search, recipe ratings, import/export various formats, and more.

ul.li: Recipes can be searched by name or by ingredients included or to be omitted
A shopping list can be generated from selected recipes
Nutrient values can be used to help you plan any diet
Files can be imported from an existing Krecipes database
